1.0.name: wordpress/360imobile-txtimpact-sms-messaging-plug-in
1.0.description:
Mass text messaging & SMS Marketing plugin through TXTImpact allows blog's visitors to sign up to receive text message notifications whenever a new post is added. The plug-in integrates with TXTImpact sms marketing platform and allow users to signup to your mobile list via text message using a keyword on a short code. You can also send them text messages from admin panel whenever you like.

More Information

Visit the TXTImpact for more information.
